languages.text: "Пустотная проказа — страшная хворь, за последние годы поразившая несколько отсеков нижних палуб. Нашим медикариям ведомо средство, предотвращающею ее развитие на ранней стадии заражения. Но если затянуть с лечением, больного ждет незавидная участь. Когда она успела затронуть отсек НП-А14? Почему мне не доложили?.."

"Void leprosy is a terrible disease that has affected several of the lower decks in recent years. Our chirurgeons know of a remedy that prevents its development at an early stage of infection. But if treatment is delayed, the patient's fate is not pretty. When did it begin to affect Bay LD-A14, and why wasn't I informed immediately?"
languages.original_text: "Пустотная проказа — страшная хворь, за последние годы поразившая несколько отсеков нижних палуб. Нашим медикариям ведомо средство, предотвращающею ее развитие на ранней стадии заражения. Но если затянуть с лечением, больного ждет незавидная участь. Когда она успела затронуть отсек НП-А14? Почему мне не доложили?.."

traits.locale_text: "Void pox is a terrible disease that has affected several lower decks in recent years. Our chirurgeons know of a remedy that prevents its development at an early stage of infection. But if treatment is delayed, the patient's fate is not pretty. When did it affect the NP-A14 compartment? Why haven't I been told?.."

languages.text: « La lèpre du vide est une terrible maladie qui a fait des ravages dans plusieurs des ponts inférieurs ces dernières années. Nos chirurgiens ont développé un vaccin, qui doit néanmoins être inoculé avant que l'infection ne se propage. Dans le cas contraire, le patient est condamné à un sort peu enviable, il faut l'avouer. Mais j'aimerais bien savoir depuis quand la baie LP-A14 est affectée, et pourquoi je n'en ai pas été immédiatement informée ! »
languages.original_text: "Void leprosy is a terrible disease that has affected several of the lower decks in recent years. Our chirurgeons know of a remedy that prevents its development at an early stage of infection. But if treatment is delayed, the patient's fate is not pretty. When did it begin to affect Bay LD-A14, and why wasn't I informed immediately?"

traits.locale_text: « La lèpre du vide est une terrible maladie qui a fait des ravages dans plusieurs des ponts inférieurs ces dernières années. Nos chirurgiens ont développé un vaccin, qui doit néanmoins être inoculé avant que l'infection ne se propage. Dans le cas contraire, le patient est condamné à un sort peu enviable, il faut l'avouer. Mais j'aimerais bien savoir depuis quand la baie NP-A14 est affectée, et pourquoi je n'en ai pas été immédiatement informée ! »

languages.text: «La lepra del vacío es una enfermedad terrible que ha afectado a varias de las cubiertas inferiores en los últimos años. Nuestros cirujanos conocen un remedio que evita su desarrollo durante la primera fase de la infección, pero, si se retrasa el tratamiento, no hay esperanza para el paciente. ¿Cuándo empezó a extenderse por la bahía LD-A14 y por qué no se me informó de inmediato?».
languages.original_text: "Void leprosy is a terrible disease that has affected several of the lower decks in recent years. Our chirurgeons know of a remedy that prevents its development at an early stage of infection. But if treatment is delayed, the patient's fate is not pretty. When did it begin to affect Bay LD-A14, and why wasn't I informed immediately?"

traits.locale_text: «La lepra del vacío es una enfermedad terrible que ha afectado a varias de las cubiertas inferiores en los últimos años. Nuestros cirujanos conocen un remedio que evita su desarrollo durante la primera fase de la infección, pero, si se retrasa el tratamiento, no hay esperanza para el paciente. ¿Cuándo empezó a extenderse por la bahía NP-A14 y por qué no se me informó de inmediato?».

languages.text: “虚空麻风病是一种可怕的疾病，这几年已经感染了好几片底层甲板区域。我们的船医知道该如何治疗这种疾病，可以在感染初期就阻止病情发展。不过，如果治疗过程被延误的话，那病人的命运恐怕就不那么明朗了。这场感染是什么时候蔓延到LD-A14号甲板的？为什么没有人立刻通知我？”
languages.original_text: "Void leprosy is a terrible disease that has affected several of the lower decks in recent years. Our chirurgeons know of a remedy that prevents its development at an early stage of infection. But if treatment is delayed, the patient's fate is not pretty. When did it begin to affect Bay LD-A14, and why wasn't I informed immediately?"

traits.locale_text: “虚空麻风病是一种可怕的疾病，这几年已经感染了好几片底层甲板区域。我们的船医知道该如何治疗这种疾病，可以在感染初期就阻止病情发展。不过，如果治疗的过程被延误的话，那病人的命运恐怕就不那么明朗了。这场感染是什么时候蔓延到NP-A14甲板的？为什么没有人立刻通知我？”

languages.text: 「『ヴォイドハンセン病 』は恐ろしい病気で、近年下級デッキの何人かが罹患しています。私たちのチラージョンは、感染の初期段階で発症を防ぐ治療法を知っています。しかし、治療が遅れれば、患者の運命は最悪の方向に行きます。いつから、ベイLD-A14に影響が出始めたのですか？なぜ、すぐに私に知らされなかったのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Void leprosy is a terrible disease that has affected several of the lower decks in recent years. Our chirurgeons know of a remedy that prevents its development at an early stage of infection. But if treatment is delayed, the patient's fate is not pretty. When did it begin to affect Bay LD-A14, and why wasn't I informed immediately?"

traits.locale_text: 「『ヴォイドハンセン病 』は恐ろしい病気で、近年下級デッキの何人かが罹患しています。私たちのチラージョンは、感染の初期段階で発症を防ぐ治療法を知っています。しかし、治療が遅れれば、患者の運命は最悪の方向に行きます。いつから、ベイNP-A14に影響が出始めたのですか？なぜ、すぐに私に知らされなかったのですか？」

languages.text: "Leere-Lepra ist eine schreckliche Krankheit, die sich in den letzten Jahren auf einigen der Unterdecks ausgebreitet hat. Unsere Chirurgeums kennen ein Heilmittel, das die Entwicklung im frühen Infektionsstadium verhindert. Erfolgt die Behandlung jedoch zu spät, erwartet den Patienten ein unschönes Schicksal. Wann ist die Krankheit in Modul LD-A14 aufgetreten, und warum wurde ich nicht augenblicklich in Kenntnis gesetzt?"
languages.original_text: "Void leprosy is a terrible disease that has affected several of the lower decks in recent years. Our chirurgeons know of a remedy that prevents its development at an early stage of infection. But if treatment is delayed, the patient's fate is not pretty. When did it begin to affect Bay LD-A14, and why wasn't I informed immediately?"

traits.locale_text: "Leere-Lepra ist eine schreckliche Krankheit, die sich in den letzten Jahren auf einigen der Unterdecks ausgebreitet hat. Unsere Chirurgeums kennen ein Heilmittel, das die Entwicklung im frühen Infektionsstadium verhindert. Erfolgt die Behandlung jedoch zu spät, erwartet den Patienten ein unschönes Schicksal. Wann ist die Krankheit in Modul NP-A14 aufgetreten, und warum wurde ich nicht augenblicklich in Kenntnis gesetzt?"

languages.text: "Uçsuz cüzzamı, son yıllarda bazı alt güverteleri etkileyen korkunç bir hastalıktır. Cerrahlarımız, enfeksiyon erken safhalardayken yayılmayı önleyen bir tedavi biliyor. Ancak tedavi gecikirse hastanın kaderi hiç hoş olmuyor. LD-A14 Bölmesi'ni ne zaman etkisi altına aldı ve ben neden derhâl bilgilendirilmedim?"
languages.original_text: "Void leprosy is a terrible disease that has affected several of the lower decks in recent years. Our chirurgeons know of a remedy that prevents its development at an early stage of infection. But if treatment is delayed, the patient's fate is not pretty. When did it begin to affect Bay LD-A14, and why wasn't I informed immediately?"
